title: Varig
content:
Hi everyone,

Any help to where I could find the newly introduced (2007) Varig (Brazilian airline) font would be highly appreciated (see attached jpg).

Thanks in advance.
author: flyingfish

comments.content:
Here is th image of the font :

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004714im_/http:/typophile.com/files/varig_6587.jpg)
This is most certainly custom designed. No font.
